# Ortobahn

> Autonomous AI marketing engine that runs itself

Ortobahn uses a pipeline of specialized AI agents to generate strategy, create content, and publish across Bluesky, Twitter/X, and LinkedIn — fully autonomous, no humans in the loop.

- Website: https://ortobahn.com
- App: https://app.ortobahn.com
- Pricing: $49/month, 14-day free trial
- Built by: Vaultscaler (https://vaultscaler.com)

## How It Works
5-agent pipeline running on a schedule:
1. Analytics Agent — analyzes past performance
2. CEO Agent — sets strategy and direction
3. Strategist Agent — creates content plans from trending topics
4. Creator Agent — writes platform-native posts
5. Publisher Agent — confidence-gates and publishes

## Get Started
Sign up: https://ortobahn.com/#request-access
API: POST https://app.ortobahn.com/api/onboard
